medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient felt well until last week when he stopped four days of dexamethasone 40mg daily. Since then, he has felt progressively weak and today developed severe abdominal pain, which resolved without medication or other intervention. After eating lunch, he felt slightly better, but shaking chills started upon arrival to the floor.
